title: Cars Simulator

content.developer: Cars Simulator is created by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Home› 1 PlayerCars SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenDo you think you are a good driver who has car handling skills? If yes, Cars Simulator will give you the ultimate race experience. With no speed limits you have freedom of movement of your car. There are 3 landscapes created for you: • 1 Forest landscape• 2 industrial landscapesThere are 3 cars: • Rally car • Police Car • Old Car Controls:WASD or arrow keys to drive carSpace bar for handbrakeC to change view (camera)Shift to boost carR to reset sceneE to turn on police lightsX to hide instructions1, 2, 3 to change carTAB to exit main menuDeveloperCars Simulator is created by FreezeNova.This article was updated on February 19, 20241 Player3DCarCrazyDriftDrivingFreeRacingSimulatorSpeedStunt
